00111 #ifdef EFFECT_CATEGORIES   
00112    // This maps URIs to EffectCategory pointers for all added categories.
00113    // It is needed for fast lookup and easy deletion.
00114    typedef std::map<wxString, EffectCategory*> CategoryMap;
00115    CategoryMap *mCategories;
00116    
00117    // These are the root categories, i.e. the ones without parents.
00118    CategorySet *mRootCategories;
00119
